creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: long, thin branch of a peony bush extending upwards from LLC; two blossoms in full bloom, with smaller, unopened bud in center; top blossom is grey, lower blossom is white; shorter branches with leaves open outward towards edges; inscription at ULC
marks:
Inscription and Seals

ULC, in Japanese
title: Chrysanthemum and Peony (Peony; one of a pair)
